title: Ilmu Pengetahuan dan Teknologi
description: Focusing on the advancement of science and technology within the organization.
content: This division is responsible for all tech-related activities, workshops, and innovations. We aim to foster a culture of continuous learning and technological adaptation.

title: Seni dan Budaya
description: Promoting art and culture to enrich the community spirit.
content: Our goal is to preserve and celebrate our rich cultural heritage through various artistic expressions and cultural events.
